name: Only One Way (Serban Orza)
description:
The main purpose of this game is to satisfy your interest and to capture your attention with its content. 

The game is about saving 11 people from a great disaster and...

Hmm...what do you think is the best idea to fight against  a disaster?...OTHER DISASTERS✔

  •  Almost everything can be destroyed! 
  • Only human characters are immune to everything except the big bomb which would destroy the whole world! 
  • But make sure people not to fall off the map...
  • Give it a try!

  My team:

  • 3D designer: Razvan Orza (Diego)
  • Music: Maria Cristina Lucan
  • Ideas:  Maria Cristina Popa
  • Programmer / Game-developer: me, Serban Orza
